definition: to be generally referred to (as)/generic term
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
variant of 秤[cheng4]/steelyard
to weigh/to state/to name/name/appellation/to praise
to fit/balanced/suitable

sentences.english: The furnace employed for making "E" glass is of a type known as a Unit Melter.
sentences.chinese: 用来制造“E”玻璃的窑是一种通称为单元窑的窑炉。

sentences.english: Supporting China's feudal dynasty monarch known as the highest official in charge of the state.
sentences.chinese: 我国封建王朝辅助君主掌管国事的最高官员的通称。

sentences.english: An outline is a common name given to a tree-shaped hierarchy in a document.
sentences.chinese: 大纲是对文档中树型结构的通称。

sentences.english: Women are known as adult women.
sentences.chinese: 妇女是成年女子的通称。

sentences.english: This law is known as Ohm's law.
sentences.chinese: 这个定律通称为欧姆定律。

sentences.english: The ordinary numbers of arithmetic and elementary algebra are known as scalars.
sentences.chinese: 算术和初等代数中普通的数通称纯量。

sentences.english: The play to Tokyo international airport, general term for stage haneda airport.
sentences.chinese: 该剧以东京国际机场，通称羽田机场为舞台。

sentences.english: "Bi"is the valuable ritual vessels and another name for jade.
sentences.chinese: “璧”为贵重礼器，也是美玉的通称。

sentences.english: Because of their dense soft fur fabric, like otters, it is known as Rex Rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 因其皮毛绒密柔软，酷似水獭，故在我国通称为獭兔。

sentences.english: The crocodile is a general term of animals of Crocodilia, Reptilia, which have high economic and medical value.
sentences.chinese: 鳄鱼是脊索动物门爬行纲鳄目动物的通称。

sentences.english: Cancer is a generic term for a large group of diseases that can affect any part of the body.
sentences.chinese: 癌症是一组可影响身体任何部位的多种疾病的通称。

definition: also known as/alternative name/to also be called
to be collectively called/collective term/general designation
also called/also known as/a.k.a.
general term
also known as
generic term
commonly referred to as/common term
old term/old way of referring to sth
... hence the name (used at the end of a sentence)
to make a general reference/to be used in a general sense
to be called/to be known as
vernacular name/lay name (of a priest)
scientific name/Latin name (of plant or animal)/(according to an old system of nomenclature) on entering school life, a formal personal name given to new students
abbreviation
also known as/alternative name/to also be called
to refer in particular to
